thread.title: Corsair Announces Its First Fully Built Desktop, Corsair One | News & Opinion
thread.title_full: Corsair Announces Its First Fully Built Desktop, Corsair One | News & Opinion | PCMag.com

author: Matthew Buzzi
title: Corsair Announces Its First Fully Built Desktop, Corsair One | News & Opinion
text:
Computer component and gaming peripheral maker Corsair has developed its own gaming desktop.
The Corsair One will be a fully built desktop, meaning it's pre-assembled with all the components it needs to run; specs and pricing were not revealed. As you can see in the image, the Corsair One is a small-form-factor system with a sleek, minimalist design.
